title: Browser Cache Inspection
description:
Some users report that credentials reappear even after logout—cached pages may be leaking data.

Objective: Inspect and purge browser cache artifacts (e.g., via BrowserHistoryView or sqlite3) to remove any stored credentials.
dialogue: Mira: "The browser cache might still hold stolen credentials—let's clear and inspect it."
Mira: "Can you help me purge any stored credentials from the cache?"
hints: Use a cache-viewer or sqlite3 to extract saved form data from the cache database.
